channel.title: 525: How do you fix Hp bar?
channel.description: I own a server called Epidemic-scape.no-ip.biz ; I have everything i need so far working to make it a great server will all these cool features; but, the hitpoint bar is terrible. When your at half heath the bar is red and when you die the bar is half red half green. Does anyone know a way to make it like other working 525 server hitpoint bars?

item.title: 525: How do you fix Hp bar?
item.dc:creator: @EpidemicScape525 EpidemicScape525
